title: Dubai Metro announces new Ramadan 2026 timings, adds late-night Friday service
summary_full: Dubai's RTA has adjusted public transport timings for Ramadan 2026, with the Metro operating extended hours to accommodate late-night prayers and gatherings. Paid parking offers an "Iftar Break" with free periods, while Salik tolls have reduced rates outside peak hours, ensuring smooth travel throughout the holy month.
